thread.title: Troubled retailer Carpetright to raise capital, sell stake to key investor

title: Troubled retailer Carpetright to raise capital, sell stake to key investor
text: March 21, 2018 / 7:55 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago Troubled retailer Carpetright to raise capital, sell stake to key investor Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (Reuters) - Retailer Carpetright ( CPRC.L ) has agreed a loan with a shareholder in exchange for new shares to fund the short term running of the company, and may raise a further 60 million pounds to strengthen its balance sheet, it said on Wednesday. A branch of Carpetright is seen in south west London, Britain January 19, 2018. REUTERS/Toby Melville Carpetright, which has issued a series of profit-warnings because of tepid high-street spending, said it would also look to reduce its property portfolio. It has agreed the loan with shareholder Meditor. Reporting by Elisabeth O'Leary; Editing by Kate Holton
